TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SubsetMatchingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 枚举匹配模式的子集值。

span.span: Enumerates values of subset matching mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在 System.Speech，构造成功识别短语，即使其内容的一个子集的音频输入中找到的语法。In System.Speech, you can construct a grammar that successfully recognizes a phrase even though only a subset of its contents is found in the audio input. 默认情况下，识别引擎要求整个短语的完全匹配项。By default, a recognition engine requires an exact match against an entire phrase. 识别引擎还可以匹配根据定义的参数部分短语用作参数的成员或构造函数，或方法。The recognition engine can also match partial phrases according to parameters defined by a member used as an argument to the or constructors, or the method. 以下展示了如何每个的成员影响在包含该短语的语法中使用"car 的平面的船舶卡车"时识别。The following illustrates how each of the members affects recognition when used in a grammar that contains the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane". **OrderedSubset****OrderedSubset** 此模式将指示的短语子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果满足以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 音频输入中识别的短语中的一个或多个单词。One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input. - 这些已识别单词的相对顺序是短语相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 匹配的单词可能包含仅介词和文章。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 将短语添加到使用 OrderedSubset 语法"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车"模式下生成上识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubset mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"汽车的小船卡车""a car the truck a boat"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 已识别的子集不需要为一系列的原始字符串。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 用于识别使用介词和文章。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **OrderedSubsetContentRequired****OrderedSubsetContentRequired** 此模式将指示的短语子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果满足以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 短语中的一个或多个单词被识别的音频输入中和One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input, and - 这些已识别单词的相对顺序是短语相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 匹配的单词不能包含仅介词和文章。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 将短语添加到使用 OrderedSubsetContentRequired 语法"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车"模式下生成上识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubsetContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"汽车的小船卡车""a car the truck a boat"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 已识别的子集不需要为一系列的原始字符串。A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 语音输入必须包含文章和介词以外的单词。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| **子序列：****Subsequence:** 此模式将指示的短语子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果满足以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 短语中的一个或多个单词的音频输入中被识别为一系列短语，并One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase, and - 这些已识别单词的相对顺序是短语相同。The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase. - 匹配的单词可能包含仅介词和文章。Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles. 将短语"car 的平面的船舶卡车"添加到使用子序列模式的语法生成在识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using Subsequence mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"汽车的小船卡车""a car the truck a boat"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 已识别的子集必须是原始字符串的序列。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized. 用于识别使用介词和文章。Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **SubsequenceContentRequired****SubsequenceContentRequired** 此模式将指示的短语子集将用于成功识别整个短语，如果满足以下条件：This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - 匹配字符串中的一个或多个单词的音频输入中被识别为一系列短语。One or more words in the match string are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase. - 匹配的单词不能包含仅介词和文章。Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles. 将短语添加到使用 SubsequenceContentRequired 语法"一辆汽车的平面的船舶卡车"模式下生成上识别以下结果：Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using SubsequenceContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**输入的短语****Input Phrase**|**结果****Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"汽车的平面的船舶卡车""a car the truck a boat that plane"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"汽车的小船卡车""a car the truck a boat"|识别整个短语"一个平面的船舶卡车的 car"。The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"一辆汽车的平面""a car the that plane"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 已识别的子集必须是原始字符串的序列。A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"汽车的平面的卡车船""a car the boat a truck that plane"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 单词是无序。The words are out of order.| |"""a the"|识别不成功。Recognition is not successful. 语音输入必须包含文章和介词以外的单词。Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| ## Examples 下面是用于生成四个测试例程对象，对每个使用相同的短语， `SubsetMatchingModes`。Below is a test routine which generates four objects, using the same phrase, for each of the `SubsetMatchingModes`. 这些对象然后可以进行测试。These objects can then be tested. ``` private void CreateSubsetMatchTest() { foreach ( System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode mode in Enum.GetValues(typeof(System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode))) { GrammarBuilder gb = new GrammarBuilder("a car the truck a boat that plane",mode); Grammar grammar = new Grammar(gb); grammar.Name = mode.ToString(); grammar.Enabled=true; _recognizer.LoadGrammar(grammar); } } ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubset = int32(1)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 OrderedSubset。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubset**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode OrderedSubsetContentRequired = int32(3)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 OrderedSubsetContentRequired。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubsetContentRequired**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode Subsequence = int32(0)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 Subsequence。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **Subsequence**.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode SubsequenceContentRequired = int32(2)

summary.span: 指示子集匹配模式是 SubsequenceContentRequired。

span.span: Indicates that subset matching mode is **SubsequenceContentRequired**.
